This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0375 defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
SFHB Stromal free hemoglobin preparationsStromal free hemoglobin preparations
FLUR FluorocarbonsFluorocarbons

name: ArtificialBlood
title: artificialBlood
description: Code system of concepts that identify the artificial blood identifier associated with the specimen.  Used in the Interaction Specimen Container Detail (SAC) segment in HL7 Version 2.x messaging.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0375 (Artificial Blood)
